name: Allen Capital Group
overview:
By developing and implementing customized processes, procedures and systems, Allen Capital Group specializes in working with and helping business owners build and improve the infrastructure of their business.

The business infrastructure is the foundation upon which all long and short term strategic and tactical planning is developed and implemented.

Once the business infrastructure is in place, Allen Capital Group tailors a leadership and management discipline process to evaluate the quality and success of the infrastructure.

Allen Capital Group coaches and mentors the business owner on a process call â€˜Disciplinesâ€™. Disciplines require the business owner to review, analyze, amend and implement necessary changes to their infrastructure on a timely basis. Disciplines enable the business owner to maintain a structured management and leadership process, designed for the purpose of improving their companyâ€™s incremental profits.
